description: This file implements functions related to a Simple Client TCP Object, including handling application messages, sending TLS messages, and notifying events within the Advanced Networking Service Container (ANSC) framework.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscSctoTsaRecvAppMessage(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMessageBdo)
methods.description: Handles an incoming application message received over a buffer descriptor, copying data to the receive buffer, updating counters, and notifying resource constraints if needed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscSctoTsaSendTlsMessage(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMessageBdo)
methods.description: Sends out a TLS encapsulated message buffer descriptor through the associated object's send function.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscSctoTsaNotifyEvent(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulEvent,ULONG ulError,ANSC_HANDLE hEventContext)
methods.description: Handles various connection events such as established, closed, terminated, or timeout, updating object state and notifying higher layers accordingly.
